'Davagna' is a [[comune]] (municipality) in the Province of Genoa in the Italian
region Liguria, located about 13 km northeast of Genoa. As of 31 December
2004, it had a population of 1,817 and an area of 22.1 kmÂ². All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical
institute Istat.
